bool fail() const;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Returns {{c|true}} if an error has occurred on the associated stream. Specifically, returns {{c|true}} if {{tt|badbit}} or {{tt|failbit}} is set in {{lc|rdstate()}}. 

See {{l2tt|cpp/io/ios_base/iostate}} for the list of conditions that set {{tt|failbit}} or {{tt|badbit}}.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
{{c|true}} if an error has occurred, {{c|false}} otherwise.
